bug_fix.template:
Fix the following bug: {description}

Steps:
1. Reproduce the bug and document reproduction steps
2. Identify root cause
3. Implement fix
4. Test thoroughly
5. Document the fix

Deliverables:
- Fixed code
- Test cases
- Reproduction steps (before fix)
- Verification that bug is resolved
examples: Fix the health monitor timeout issue
Resolve the calendar sync bug
Fix memory leak in the event handler

feature_build.template:
Build the following feature: {description}

Requirements:
{requirements}

Deliverables:
- Working implementation
- Unit tests
- Integration tests (if applicable)
- Documentation
- Usage examples

Implementation notes:
- Follow existing code patterns
- Add error handling
- Include logging
- Write clear comments
examples: Build a calendar event reminder system
Implement OAuth2 authentication for API
Create a file backup scheduler

optimization.template:
Optimize {system} for {metric}

Tasks:
1. Benchmark current performance
2. Profile and identify bottlenecks
3. Implement optimizations
4. Benchmark after changes
5. Document improvements

Deliverables:
- Optimized code
- Before/after benchmarks
- Performance comparison report
- Documentation of changes
examples: Optimize database query performance
Reduce API response time
Improve memory usage in event processing

integration.template:
Integrate {service} with {existing_system}

Requirements:
{requirements}

Deliverables:
- Integration code
- Error handling for API failures
- Retry logic
- Logging
- Tests (unit + integration)
- Documentation
- Usage examples

Safety:
- Handle rate limits
- Validate all inputs/outputs
- Fail gracefully
- Don't expose credentials
examples: Integrate Spotify API for music control
Connect Google Calendar for event management
Add Notion integration for note syncing

full_system.template:
Build complete system: {description}

Architecture:
{architecture}

Success criteria:
{criteria}

Deliverables:
- Complete working system
- All components implemented
- Comprehensive tests
- Full documentation
- Deployment guide
- Usage examples
- Error handling throughout

Approach:
1. Design architecture
2. Build core components
3. Integrate components
4. Test thoroughly
5. Document everything
6. Verify success criteria met
examples: Build a complete task management dashboard
Create an automated backup and monitoring system
Implement a multi-service notification aggregator

refactor.template:
Refactor {component} to {goal}

Objectives:
{objectives}

Constraints:
- Maintain backward compatibility (unless specified)
- Don't break existing tests
- Improve code quality
- Add tests for new structure

Deliverables:
- Refactored code
- All existing tests passing
- New tests for refactored code
- Migration guide (if breaking changes)
- Documentation updates
examples: Refactor authentication module to use OAuth2
Restructure database models for better performance
Refactor API handlers to use async/await

documentation.template:
Create documentation for {component}

Include:
- Overview and purpose
- Installation/setup
- Usage examples
- API reference (if applicable)
- Configuration options
- Troubleshooting
- Examples of common use cases

Style:
- Clear and concise
- Code examples for everything
- Markdown format
- Well-structured with headers
examples: Document the sub-agent framework
Write API documentation for weather service
Create usage guide for backup system

testing.template:
Write tests for {component}

Test coverage:
- Unit tests for all functions
- Integration tests for workflows
- Edge cases
- Error conditions
- Mock external dependencies

Deliverables:
- Complete test suite
- All tests passing
- Coverage report
- Documentation of test scenarios
examples: Write tests for calendar integration
Create test suite for authentication module
Add integration tests for backup system

research.template:
Research {topic} and provide recommendations

Research goals:
{goals}

Deliverables:
- Summary of findings
- Comparison of options (if applicable)
- Recommendations with justification
- Implementation considerations
- Resource links
- Next steps

Format: Clear markdown document with sections
examples: Research best practices for API rate limiting
Evaluate different database options for time-series data
Research OAuth2 providers and their features

security_audit.template:
Security audit of {component}

Audit areas:
- Authentication/authorization
- Input validation
- Data sanitization
- Credential storage
- API security
- Error messages (don't leak info)
- Dependencies (known vulnerabilities)

Deliverables:
- Detailed audit report
- List of vulnerabilities found (prioritized)
- Recommended fixes
- Implementation plan for fixes
- Security best practices documentation
examples: Security audit of API endpoints
Review authentication system for vulnerabilities
Audit credential storage and handling
